a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Estimated annual deaths of children aged under five years per 100,000 population. Deaths are broken down into:
injuries (such as accidents, violence, and suicides); communicable, maternal, neonatal, and nutritional diseases;
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
